person.bio: Sacha is a positive and outgoing individual. Seeking challenging and dynamic opportunities, he invests himself in sustainable activities with a view to producing real results and doing good for the world. He believes that change is the only constant.

node.title: Not your average blockchain project

node.title: What Bitcoin did to money, ThreeFold is doing to the Internet
node.excerpt: As the Internet is struggling with issues due to its centralized model, ThreeFold spent the last six years developing a new open-source peer-to-peer Internet infrastructure from the ground up.

node.title: Connecting the Dots: ThreeFold plans to scale globally
node.excerpt: ThreeFold started as an idea about ten years ago and is now manifesting itself into the most comprehensive peer-to-peer Internet and cloud infrastructure in the world. The potential of our technology to revolutionize digitization globally is endless and limited only to our collective imagination.

node.title: Can a 'Democratized' Internet exist in times of a Cyber War?
node.excerpt: With cyber sovereignty turning into a non-territorial challenge to sovereignty itself irrespective of the virtual realm of the internet, is there a way out for humanity?

node.title: An Intro to the ThreeFold Token
node.excerpt: The ThreeFold Token (TFT) is a decentralized digital currency used to buy autonomous and decentralized Internet services (compute, storage, and application) on the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: Co-Realizing the Promise
node.excerpt: Together with our global community, we're realizing the initial promise of an open-source, peer-to-peer Internet owned by the people.

node.title: A Smart Contract for all IT workloads
node.excerpt: The Smart Contract for IT allows you, your company or your community to execute the storage and running of your files and applications securely with consensus and automatic billing.

node.title: How ThreeFold Will Give Internet to 43% of the Worlds Population
node.excerpt: Proper access to the Internet helps to protect peoples freedom of speech and thought, as well as access to knowledge and information.
